occupation: Full Stack Engineer at Alphadna Pvt Ltd
headline: Experienced Software Engineer | Optimized APIs & Backend Systems | GCP Deployment Expert
summary: Full Stack Software Developer, API Tester, and GCP Deployment Engineer. Experienced with leading technologies: Node.js, Express.js, React.js, MongoDB, Firebase Storage, Google Cloud Platform (GCP). Specialized in developing high-performance React.js applications, designing and testing robust RESTful APIs, and deploying applications on GCP. Skilled in containerization with Docker, orchestration with Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE), and automated API testing using Postman. Optimized backend systems, reduced response times and code complexity by 50%, and achieved zero downtime for critical applications. Effectively managed project priorities, improving timelines and client outcomes. Completed '30 Days of Postman for Developers' by Postman, Inc.

experiences.title: Full Stack Engineer
experiences.description: Developing high-performance React.js applications for data visualization with optimized loading times and superior user experiences. Optimize backend systems by developing efficient RESTful APIs and refining schemas, reducing response times and code complexity. Deploy applications on Google Cloud Platform (App Engine, Cloud Run, Compute Engine), employing various deployment methods, version control, and CI/CD pipelines, achieving zero downtime for critical applications. Utilize Firebase storage and Firestore database to build secure and scalable file management systems. Follow SRE best practices in deployment, enhancing system reliability. Collaborate with partners to manage project priorities effectively, resulting in improved project timelines and successful client outcomes.

experiences.title: Associate Web Developer
experiences.description: Develop front-end applications to visualize data provided by the client or back-end team
